welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Middelharnis, known for its beautiful canals and historic buildings. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all flights at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo flights at Gilze-Rijen Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
